Articles.Content:
In the year 1987, NASA launched the last of its deep space probes.......

Name the show.....
I thought I was the only old guy on here, but yep.
Heh! There are a few of us about. I used to watch Buck Rogers in the 25th Century as a kid. Loved the launch tubes from both that, and the original BSG.
Oh yeah, the colonial viper. Sweet ride. The EDF star fighter, from BR, another sweet ride.
